doctor.name: Dr. Md. Kamrul Hasan Badol
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kamrul Hasan Badol is a Endocrinologist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Endocrinology). He is a Associate Professor, Endocrinology & Metabolism at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Apollo Diagnostic Center, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Kamrul Hasan Badol at Apollo Diagnostic Center, Rangpur is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.
